name: step-ca
description: Smallstep Certificates is a self-hosted, ACME-compatible certificate authority and identity system. It automates certificate issuance and rotation for machines and services via CLI and APIs.
features: Certificate authority: Issues and manages X.509 certificates for internal infrastructure.
ACME protocol: Automates certificate issuance with Let's Encrypt-compatible ACME.
Short-lived certificates: Issues certificates with short lifespans for enhanced security.
Automatic renewal: Renews certificates automatically before expiration.
Multiple provisioners: Supports ACME, OAuth, OIDC, and other authentication methods.
SSH certificates: Issues SSH certificates for secure server and user authentication.
API access: Manages certificates programmatically via REST API.
Hardware security: Integrates with HSMs and cloud KMS for key protection.
Certificate templates: Defines custom certificate profiles and policies.
Audit logging: Tracks all certificate operations for compliance.
CLI tools: Manages CA and certificates with command-line utilities.
Webhook notifications: Triggers external systems on certificate events.
